concept.title: Configuring BIG-IP
concept.shortdesc: You can create a public and private VLAN and assign virtual network interfaces on the VM as untagged interfaces to the VLAN. The public VLAN is the network on which client devices connect to BIG-IP. The private VLAN is the network on which BIG-IP connects to servers.

image.alt: Create a public and private VLAN and assign virtual network interfaces
Aquire and assign IP addresses to the BIG-IP configuration
